data.title: Best Movies Like Brewster McCloud
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Brewster McCloud: Picking Up the Pieces (2000), Seven Psychopaths (2012), Clay Pigeons (1998), Miss Nobody (2010), Heathers (1988), Curdled (1996), The Big Lebowski (1998), Eating Raoul (1982), Vampire's Kiss (1988), Little Murders (1971)
